question: By how much do they improve on domain classification?
ground_truth: F-1 score was improved by 1.19 percent points.

question: Which dataset do they evaluate on?
ground_truth: The dataset was created by extracting utterances from the user log data from an intelligent conversational system.

question: How do they decide by how much to decrease confidences of incorrectly predicted domains?
ground_truth: The confidence of the incorrectly predicted domain is decreased only when it is highest among all predictions.
